name: CreateSpaceInWorkspace
description:
Add a new Space to a Workspace.

Use this tool to create a new space within a specified workspace on ClickUp. It should be called when a user wants to organize tasks or projects under a new space in their team environment.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace where the new space will be added. It should be an integer value.

parameters.name: new_space_configuration
parameters.description: JSON object with details for the new space, including its name, multiple assignees option, and features.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
